gameDetails.name: New York 1901: Painted Figures
gameDetails.description:
New York 1901: Painted Figures is pretty much what the name says: a set of sixteen painted figures for use in New York 1901 in place of the figures included in the base game.

There is also a small variant rule included. Before the game, each player places one of their unpainted workers on one of the five streets. If they have majority on that street at the end of the game, they score points.
